column4: so ive got some firefox weirdness going on .. basically it says its already running .. when i dont have a ff screen to play with
so .. how do i kill it all and start over .. or are there other options like a task manager
you can also try:  ps aux | grep firefox
that looks bamf
glad you like it. did you find your process id?
does the process hang or does it not return anything? does it dump you back at the prompt?
doesnt return anything and doesnt return me to prompt
try just: ps aux
it comes up there!
ok: kill -9 <processid>
do i need to exit that to the prompt first?
exited it .. tried it .. returned me ot prompt
ps aux should just list what processes are running and dump you back to the prompt. what you really need is the process id (PID) of firefox. when you did the ps aux did you see firefox?
so thje PID was 2101
. . . how are things going?
im just gonna reboot :D but thanks for you time very very much :D
any time. sorry i couldn't be more help.
you can use the bot: msg ubottu !info <packagename>
with a / in front of the msg
awesome workaround :D
how did you install it?
